name: Panda Kana
description:
The Panda wanna to learn the human's language to talk with people,.

He wanna decrease the pollution and restore the balance with nature.

For that, he will enter in a adventure to find the lost cards in the wood with information of Hiragana, one write system in Japanese Language.

Unfortunately, the monster generate by pollution will try to stop him.

Instructions:

Kill all monsters in the wood stage to have access to card in central tree.

Pick the card in central tree

Memorize the corresponding roman syllable, but be carefully, the symbol only will show one tiime

Pick the correct syllables when finalize the kana line

Remember,  you only have one shot to learn all kanas, when die, you will restart from stage 0.

Controls:

🠰🠱🠲🠳: Movement the Panda

Space: Attack with Katana

Game Concept:

Game of Enemys in rooms, but with the Memory Game Mechanic because you need to memorize the respective Hiragana with Romanji.
